pageProps.title: WordDumb
pageProps.teaser: A calibre plugin that generates Word Wise and X-Ray files.

data.title: WordDumb
data.slogan: A calibre plugin that generates Word Wise and X-Ray files.
data.description: A calibre plugin that generates Word Wise and X-Ray files then sends them to Kindle. Supports KFX, AZW3 and MOBI eBooks. X-Ray supports 18 languages.
data.author: xxyzz
